cause.description:
To form a strong network of friends/supporters/volunteers
To control the decline in the number of trees resulting from urbanisation, ignorance and personal gains
To develop a programme that will involve the local community in the conservation of new and existing plantation
1. Cutting down of existing trees must stop. The trees must be marked and protected
2. Plantation of 100,000 road side trees in Karachi by 2010
3. Implement a foolproof sustainability plan and raise funds through sponsors
cause.mission: To develop support base of volunteers and launch a sustainable tree plantation campaign
cause.name: Planting Pakistan
